div.p: Parent class for any item in clinical or administrative health-related system. Contains metadata attributes that apply to any item represented in the standard health record. An DomainResource can belong to a single person's health record, or represent an entity that surfaces in multiple records, such as organizations, providers, payments, decision support artifacts, etc.

publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups

description.value: Parent class for any item in clinical or administrative health-related system. Contains metadata attributes that apply to any item represented in the standard health record.
